_sText:
Little description
==============

-  **This map is a surf kill map where you can plant bomb, surf like crazy and have fun killing other players, It has many secrets and lots of teleports to have fun with. "Surf_green style"**


 

 

 

 

Map specifications
==================

- Supports 40 players
- Structures have an de_Inferno style
- Textures are comfortable to the eye (They fit with the structures)
- Lots of secrets teleports
- Surf killing map "Surf green alike"
- Optimized map "High fps version"
- Fun to play
- No bugs, final and stable version.



--------------------------------------------

**My nick in-game:** Lord Cheaterfield


**My steam ID:** STEAM_0:0:16113354


--------------------------------------------



Please, I would appreciate if you could rate and comment about my map so it motivates me to keep doing them for CS:S, and before rate the map, please try it in game so you can appreciate the details and the gameplay.
====================================================================================================================

PS: To the people that may think this is a copy of surf_10xreloaded, before start bitching let me explain that nothing is copied from that map, i've made the structures and ramps from 0 since i wanted an optimized map and well created. its just looks "alike" but is not the same.
